about_the_game:
In this game you play as a ghost, waking up in the underworld, where souls are wandering aimlessly. You remember one specific detail however, your dog, waiting for you in your home back in the real world. Undertake an adventure through the layers of the underworld, solving handcrafted puzzles, defeating enemies with a fun and easy to learn combat system, and test your skills with platforming sections.

Upgrade your player as you progress throughout the game by collecting coins of the dead, the coins that other souls are buried with to ensure safe passage through the underworld. Experience the linear world, designed and handcrafted to progress with the story, and uncover its secrets.

This game is developed by one person, and the stylized art is all hand drawn.

short_description: As a recently deceased ghost, you only remember one thing, You have to get back to your dog. Fight enemies and solve puzzles to escape the underworld in this action puzzle platformer. Explore the different layers of the underworld, and face challenges along the way, drawn in a charming 2D style.
